Title: Queen Christina
Writer: H.M. Harwood (screen play), Salka Viertel (screen play), Salka Viertel (from the original story by), Margaret P. Levino (from the original story by), S.N. Behrman (dialogue)
Actors: Greta Garbo, John Gilbert, Ian Keith, Lewis Stone
Plot: Queen Christina of Sweden is a dominant European ruler in the 17th century, and has never thought of romance. However, she accidentally and secretly falls in love with an emissary from Spain, even though a marriage between the two seems out of the question.
